Risk: Animation performance degradation on low-end devices with 10x10 boards
Mitigation Strategy: Implement performance budgets, use CSS transforms, add quality settings, progressive enhancement for animations
Comments: Affects user experience on mobile devices

Risk: Redux store becoming too complex with multiple slices causing maintenance issues
Mitigation Strategy: Use Redux Toolkit best practices, implement clear separation of concerns, document state shape, regular refactoring

Risk: E2E tests becoming flaky due to animation timing and async operations
Mitigation Strategy: Implement proper wait strategies, disable animations in tests, use deterministic timing, quarantine flaky tests

Risk: Responsive layout breaking on extreme aspect ratios or foldable devices
Mitigation Strategy: Extensive viewport testing, implement container queries, define min/max constraints

Risk: Input handling race conditions during rapid move sequences
Mitigation Strategy: Implement move queue, debouncing, state machine for input handling, comprehensive concurrency testing
Comments: More likely on high-end devices with fast input

Risk: Monorepo migration complexity when adding multiplayer in future epics
Mitigation Strategy: Design folder structure for easy extraction, keep networking code modular, document architecture decisions

Risk: State migration failures when schema changes between versions
Mitigation Strategy: Implement versioned migrations, comprehensive migration testing, fallback to reset with user consent

Risk: CSS Grid performance issues with frequent board updates
Mitigation Strategy: Use transform for animations instead of grid repositioning, implement virtual rendering for large boards
Comments: Modern browsers handle well but worth monitoring

Risk: OAuth provider API changes or deprecations breaking authentication
Mitigation Strategy: Version lock SDKs, monitor deprecation notices, implement fallback to email/password, abstract provider logic

Risk: Database query performance degradation with growing user base
Mitigation Strategy: Implement proper indexing, query optimization, caching layer, database monitoring, load testing

Risk: Avatar storage costs escalating with user growth
Mitigation Strategy: Implement size limits, image compression, CDN caching, storage quotas, cleanup policies

Risk: Board shuffle algorithm producing unsolvable states due to incorrect parity calculation
Mitigation Strategy: Implement comprehensive unit tests for solvability verification, use proven algorithms, add deterministic seeding for testing
Comments: Critical for game integrity; could destroy user trust

Mitigation Strategy: Multiple email provider fallbacks, retry logic, monitoring, local queue for retries, clear user communication

Risk: Sensitive data exposure in logs or error messages
Mitigation Strategy: Log sanitization, structured logging, PII detection tools, security training, audit reviews

Risk: Authentication service becoming bottleneck under load
Mitigation Strategy: Horizontal scaling preparation, caching auth tokens, connection pooling, load balancing, performance monitoring
